attributes.action: Provide HAZARD PAY to all NHS & Ambulance staff working the Covid-19 frontline
attributes.additional_details: We are asking our Government and Parliament for a much more powerful public statement beyond just clapping or drawing pictures in the window. You must do something to truly help our NHS and Ambulance staff hear your true support
attributes.background: Our NHS and Ambulance staff do this work because they care about others, but this crisis is putting them into a position of not only endangering themselves, but also their families. This petition is about recognition of the sacrifice they make each and every day

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
